Title: Hot Ticket
Writer: Aziz Ansari (created by), Alan Yang (created by), Aziz Ansari (teleplay by), Alan Yang (teleplay by), Harris Wittels (story by), Zoe Jarman (story editor), Sarah Peters (story editor)
Actors: Aziz Ansari, Eric Wareheim, Kelvin Yu, Lena Waithe
Plot: Dev's plan to score a date with a pretty waitress by inviting her to a concert doesn't have quite the result he wanted.
